org.objectfabric

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objectfabric.TObject
      • org.objectfabric.Counter

  • public class Counter
extends TObject
    This counter can be incremented by multiple threads and processes without loosing increments. Can be used in a transaction. A transaction will never be in conflict if it only adds to a counter without reading its value.
